c5e12

a. A5EE16 + BA16 b. 01111010(2 + 1A6(16 c.011101110001(2 + 56(10

a) 10x16^5 + 5x16^4 + 14x16^3 + 14x16^2 + 1x16^1 + 6x16^0= 10485760 + 327680 + 57344 + 3584 + 16 + 6= 10 874 390(10

   11x16^3 + 10x16^2 + 1x16^1 + 6x16^0= 45056 + 2560 + 16 + 6= 47638(10
  
   10922028(10

b) 01111010= 1111010


   1x2^6 + 1x2^5 + 1x2^4 + 1x2^3 + 0x2^2 + 1x2^1 + 0x2^0= 64 + 32 + 16 + 8 + 2= 122(10

   1x16^2 + 10x16^1 + 6x16^0= 256 + 160 + 6= 422(10

c) 011101110001=11101110001

  1x2^10 + 1x2^9 + 1x2^8 + 0x2^7 + 1x2^6 + 1x2^5 + 1x2^4 + 0x2^3 + 0x2^2 + 0x2^1 + 1x2^0= 1024 + 512 + 256 + 64 + 32 + 16 + 1= 1905(10
  
  1905 + 56= 1961(10
